snippet.title: Kosmokrats — SPACE FORCE Recruitment Trailer
snippet.description:
Kosmokrats is the People's zero-gravity puzzle adventure game, coming to PC later this year! Wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1204410/Kosmokrats


Modern Wolf and Pixel Delusion present Kosmokrats. Pilot your drone to solve dynamic puzzles. Assemble a mighty space fleet to colonize the stars. Will you choose to build a socialist utopia? A post-human technocracy? Or a brutal dictatorship? The choice is yours, comrade! 



Wishlist Kosmokrats to get all the updates: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1204410/Kosmokrats
Follow Modern Wolf on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ModernWolfLtd
Follow Pixel Delusion on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ModernWolfLtd


More details at Modernwolf.net.
